channel.title: Webclient trouble
channel.description:
I wanted to make a webclient but according to the tutorials I need to have the bin file in my client. but my client does not have it :palm: what do I neet to do?
Tutorials: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GPyTHL3VWEY https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2mJ0uVrr68M
Source: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664842.0.html

item.title: Webclient trouble
item.dc:creator: @arsenkiller1 arsenkiller1
item.description:
@arsenkiller1 wrote:

<applet name="APLET_NAME" archive="https://putin-scape.tk/client.jar" code="client.class" height="503" width="765"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m">

also have tried a Dropbox link to my client instead of the putin-scape…

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient trouble
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The client works normally? Then the main class for the webclient should be the exact same as what you put for the jarmaker.

What’s your html look like?

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient trouble
item.dc:creator: @arsenkiller1 arsenkiller1
item.description:
@arsenkiller1 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Replace the “bin” folder with “whatever folder you have the .class files for your client in” and you’re fine.

Thank You I Found it and it worked but a new issue occured so any help would be appriciated.

The client works all fine but I tried to make a webclient with a tutorial
Tutorial:https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=509727.0
But I get an error : ClassNotFoundException client.class
but when I manually look in the directory where my .class files are I see the client.class file

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient trouble

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Replace the “bin” folder with “whatever folder you have the .class files for your client in” and you’re fine.
